company_info.Company Description: Dear Candidates,We are a fast growing Corporate company dealing in worldwide travel & tourism services.  Office located at Mumbai.  The Job Profile involves to promote, advertise our various tourism & other services of the company online as well as offline in different portals and also recruitment of candidates for promoting our services.

jd_information.description: Dear Candidates,Immediate requirement of Marketing-cum-HR Executives for our corporate office at Fort, Mumbai.  Experienced or Freshers can apply having computer knowledge, internet, good communication skills, capable of recruiting candidates to build their on team to promote various services of tourism company online and offline.  Interested may contact Mohandas urgently for appointments.
